name: Expert Pusher
description:
How many times can you push the button within 1 second?
Take the challenge!

Press the Yellow button (labelled Push) as many times as you can within 1 second. Press the Red button (labelled Reset) to reset the game and try again.

The world record of 16 times in 1 second was set by the late great Takahashi Meijin who was the inspiration for this game.

Gameplay tips from Soy Fish Studios:
Did you know that you can click with the LEFT or RIGHT mouse button on (or fingers on Android)? Try alternating with two fingers for more button presses. You can do it!
